creditline: Given in memory of Olivia Carpenter Coan, by her family
inscription: in black ink, LLC: Georgian Room
markings: label on back of frame: To Olivia-with love, and happy Georgian and other memories-Carl·22 January 1972
medium: Pen and black ink and wash, with white heightening on paper
provenance: Olivia Carpenter Coan; Patricia Spencer Ringer, Minneapolis; given to MIA, 2001.
signed: in black ink, R edge of drawing: F. Keister
title: Georgian Room, Minneapolis Institute of Arts
